remarks: Transfer existential uniqueness from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2004.)  (Revised by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)
statement:
reuxfr2.1 $e |- ( y e. B -> A e. B ) $.
reuxfr2.2 $e |- ( x e. B -> E* y e. B x = A ) $.
reuxfr2 $p |- ( E! x e. B E. y e. B ( x = A /\ ph ) <-> E! y e. B ph ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d ph x $.
